headline: A Look At Boston Scientific (BSX) Valuation After Recent Share Price Gains Cool Longer Term Momentum
summary: Context for Boston Scientific’s recent share performance Boston Scientific (BSX) has seen its share price move unevenly, with a 1 day gain of 1.5% and a 7 day gain of 3.0%, contrasting with negative returns over the month and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Boston Scientific. At a share price of US$76.85, Boston Scientific’s recent 1 day and 7 day share price gains sit against weaker 1 month, 3 month and year to date share price returns.
